sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Once per session, the character may spend 1 triumph on a successful Ranged (Heavy) or Gunnery check to add the Breach 1 quality to the attack, or increase an existing Breach rating by 1.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Heavy Hitter</name> <number>TAL0001250</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:46:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>55bd2f652f18a850e0f497eef699b6a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:46:36</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
